resources.string: This app drains your battery using the device features below. Note: enabling vibration can damange the device, use at own risk.
This app drains your battery using the device features seen at the left of the screen. Note: enabling vibration can damange the device, use at own risk.
Icons and styles for this app, were generated with Android Asset Studio and are subject to the Creative Commons 3.0 BY license.
Use this application at own risk, using this application could potentially damage your device. The author of this app is not responsible for any damage caused by using this application.
